epub.title: Epub Accessibility Developer
list: More than 3 years of working experience in ePub2, ePub3 and accessible ePub3 (both reflowable and fixed layout).
Exposure in device process like iPad, Kindle, Readium, Nook, Kobo, BookShelf.
Hands-on experience in CSS3, SCSS, HTML5.
Knowledge of validation tools like ePub, W3C and AChecker.
Experience and Knowledge in Accessibilty Feature in ePub.
Must have worked in Books. Must have end to end knowledge in Epub Accessibility
Must have end to end knowledge in Epub Accessibility

fresher.title: Fresher
list: Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in ITES (Information Technology Enabled Services), CSE (Computer Science Engineering), ECE (Electronics and Communication Engineering), or IT (Information Technology).
Knowledge of HTML: The candidate should be proficient in creating and designing web pages using HTML (HyperText Markup Language).
Knowledge of CSS: Proficiency in CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is required, as it is used for styling the layout and appearance of web pages.
Proficiency in MS Office: The candidate should have a good understanding of Microsoft Office tools, including Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, for documentation, data analysis, and presentations.
Strong attention to detail and ability to work accurately.
Good communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to work well in a team and collaborate effectively with others.
Problem-solving skills and ability to learn new technologies quickly.
